actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the earnings test for individuals who have attained retirement age.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Older Americans' Equity Act of 1993 - Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to remove the limitation on the amount of outside income which beneficiaries who have attained retirement age may earn without incurring a reduction in benefits.

titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the earnings test for individuals who have attained retirement age.
